response.overview: A shock horror film inspired by the surrealist horror of the 70s and 80s. It follows the story of two serial killers who's paths cross over the same prey. An unrelenting downward spiral into madness, once you walk down strawberry lane, there is no coming back.  Directed by Jeremy Joseph Arruda Produced by Jordayne Sherman, Aaron Babcock, and Tony Martins Written by: Jeremy Joseph Arruda, Dave Or ten, and Aaron Babcock Starring Kris Salvi, Justin Thibault, Carlo Barbieri III, Kristen McNulty, Geneva Lanouette, and Shawn Pearce. Cinematography by: Aaron Babcock and Robert Mills
response.title: Strawberry Lane
